listitem.para: Arrival time of the processes as an array.
The value of this determines whether to print the output or not(1/0).
The default (optional parameter) value of this is 0.
if the value is 0 it will only retun otherwise it will print and return.
Turn around time of the processes executing in queue 1.
Turnaround time of the processes executing in queue 2.
Turnaround time of the processes executing in queue 3.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This function takes in arrival time and burst time of different processes and returns the turnaround time and proccess id through multilevel queue scheduling algorithm.

Each level has different scheduling algorithm here the first level has roundrobin scheduling with time quantum =5, the next level with time quantum=8 and the third level schedules through FCFS algorithm.

refsection.title: Examples
refsection.programlisting: //Only returns the Turnaround time in first queue. a=mqueue(5,[1,2,3,5,4],[24,12,4,60,45])
//Returns the Turnaround time in different queues and prints the output [a,b,c]=mqueue(5,[1,2,3,5,4],[24,12,4,60,45],1)
